data.fullContent: My uncle is a driver for the post office. It's not an easy job; he works many hours and is often away from home. But he loves the job. He sees parts of the state that many of us never visit. He always returns with exciting stories about the new places he has seen.
data.answer: 我叔叔是邮局的司机。这不是一件容易的工作。他工作很多小时，而且经常不在家。但是他喜欢这份工作。他看到了我们许多人从未去过的部分州。他总是以关于他所见过的新地方的激动人心的故事回来。
